overview: Anand is a co-founder and CTO at eXacly.me. He has over 20 years of experience in software development and engineering. He joined Answerlogic (when it was < 10 people), built and led the technology team before it was acquired by Primus/Oracle. Subsequently, Anand joined Streamsage (acquired by Comcast), led the cross-platform recommendation system for videos using machine-learning techniques to augment the customer experience with serendipitous discovery of relevant video content.
